dmca.title: Demand for Immediate takedown - Notice of Infringing Activity
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Anna [mailto:anna@appp.ru] 
Posted At: Monday, October 30, 2006 8:51 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Demand for Immediate takedown - Notice of Infringing
Activity
Subject: Demand for Immediate takedown - Notice of Infringing Activity


Dear Sir or Madam,

 Pursuant to section 512(c)(3) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act,
1C Company hereby notifies you that it has received information from
which it has a good faith basis to believe that the server mentioned
below, which appear to be administrated by theplanet.com, is offering
infringing material  or is engaged in other unauthorized activities
relating to copyrighted material for which 1C Company owns the
copyright.

1. Description of copyrighted works:
Files with software "1C:Predpriyatie" (1C:Enterprise) and other program
products which are marked with 1C trademark.
Propagation of distribution and use of the counterfeit software of firm
1?
is made.

2. Also distribution of programs which allow to bypass means of
protection against copying the software of firm 1C is made.

2. Infringing materials or activity were found at the following
location:  http://www.1cfiles.net

1C Company hereby gives a notice of these activities to you and requests
that you take expeditious action to disable access to the information
location tools described above, and thereby prevent the illegal
reproduction  and distribution of these copyrighted materials via your
company's network.

 The information in this notification is accurate. Please inform us what
action you take.

The given resource under our request already repeatedly was closed by
other providers, including American. For example, GooDaddy.com

Sincerely,
Anna Lavrinova,
Lawyer
1C Company

51, Malaya Gruzinskaya str., Moscow, 123056, p/o 64, Russia
Tel.: +7(495) 681 73-81, fax: +7(495)681-78-08
E-mail: lava@1c.ru
www.1c.ru
